all_versions.name: Splunk Pattern

metadata.author: WhatWeb Project
metadata.description: Pattern extracted from WhatWeb plugin for Splunk

test_cases.input:
First time logging in? Splunk's default credentials are

username: admin
password: changeme

If you've forgotten your username or password, please contact your Splunk administrator.

all_versions.pattern:
First\ time\ logging\ in\?\ Splunk's\ default\ credentials\ are\

username:\ adminpassword:\ changeme

If\ you've\ forgotten\ your\ username\ or\ password,\ please\ contact\ your\ Splunk\ administrator\.

metadata.author: WhatWeb Project
metadata.description: Pattern extracted from WhatWeb plugin for Splunk
